Public Attributes

AkReal32 fThroughput
 Average throughput in bytes/ms.
AkUInt32 uLoopStart
 Set to the start of loop (byte offset from the beginning of the stream) for streams that loop, 0 otherwise.
AkUInt32 uLoopEnd
 Set to the end of loop (byte offset from the beginning of the stream) for streams that loop, 0 otherwise.
AkUInt8 uMinNumBuffers
AkPriority priority
 The stream priority. it should be between AK_MIN_PRIORITY and AK_MAX_PRIORITY (included).
